data.name: Pro Deer Hunting 2
data.detailed_description:
Pro Deer Hunting 2 continues the great tradition of realistic deer hunting simulations! Major graphics enhancements, inclusion of the muzzle loading
rifle and climbing tree stand are just a few of the new features. The same pro and action hunt gameplay are back with enhanced
artificial intelligence for the deer you pursue. Keep the tradition alive and become the next Pro Deer Hunter 2!

* Full support for Xbox1 controller
* Pro mode hunt for simulated deer hunting.
* Action mode hunt for realistic deer drive style hunting.
* Ability to jump bedded deer adding another dimension to your hunt.
* Enhanced controller options.
* Expansive hunting areas to include Beech Forest, Pine Plantation, Snow Fields, and Prairie level.
* Firearm and bow range for target practice.
* Choice of firearms- scoped rifle, muzzle loading rifle, pump shotgun, and compound bow.
* Ability to attract bucks with grunt tube.
* Deer gear- platform tree stands, climbing tree stand, grunt tube, binoculars, and wind direction indicator.
* Hunting Realism- attraction to feeding areas, different antler sized bucks, bucks chasing does, scent detection, and blood trailing.

data.short_description: Pro Deer Hunting 2 continues the great tradition of realistic deer hunting simulations! Major graphics enhancements, inclusion of the muzzle loading rifle and climbing tree stand are just a few of the new features. Keep the tradition alive and become the next Pro Deer Hunter 2!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 - 10 X64
  • Processor: 4 core i7 processor or compatible
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 600 series or compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated or dedicated DirectX 9 compatible soundcard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 X64
  • Processor: 4 core i7 processor or compatible
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 600 series or compatible
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated or dedicated DirectX 9 compatible soundcard

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
